text: When it comes to S3 Cross-Region Replication (CRR) which of the following is true?

answers.text: Buckets that are configured for object replication can be owned by the same AWS account or by different accounts
Buckets that are configured for object replication must be in the same Region but different AZ.
Buckets that are configured for object replication must have versioning disabled.
Buckets that are configured for object replication must be owned by the same AWS account.
